title: On320 Higher Floor 2BD Apartment for Sale
details:
Opportunity to live in one of the most facilitated apartment complexes in Colombo

Apartment has 2 Bedrooms and 2 Bathrooms with a floor area of nearly 905 sq.ft and located on a very higher floor with astonishing views. This Apartment is also fully furnished.

Investment is just 40 Million LKR

The Premises Include Many Facilities Such As a Magnificent Swimming Pool, and a Gym with One Designated Car Park and 24/7 security

Located very close to Hilton Residencies and Shopping Malls ( like Arpico..), Restaurants, Hospitals (Nawaloka) and many other amenities.

Please Contact: TSl Property to arrange an immediate viewing: on 0112677534 or 0766787070 (Whatsapp /Viber) or 0778973140 (Whatsapp /Viber)

Interested In living in Luxurious Apartments Situated In The Heart Of Colombo? Visit Our Website : www.tslproperty.com
